entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 3:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 late in the evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
